BBNZ1.Q.DE.Y.G.0018.L: Germany / National accounts / Overall economy / Labour costs per employee 1, 2, 3 / Calendar and seasonally adjusted

General: 1 Source of the original data: Federal Statistical Office. - 2 Territorial definition: Germany as of 1991, prior to that western Germany. Linked over annual average of 1991 (Bundesbank calculation). - 3 Methodology: Figures are chain-linked Laspeyres indices (annual overlap). As of 1970 up to the end of 1990, data basis according to ESA 1995. As of 1991, data basis according to ESA 2010.
